page.title: 12VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: In our village the Community Centre hosts lots of things, like the Youth Club on Tuesdays and Wednesday at 7,30pm. They also have discos, usually run by Brownies or Scouts. Sometimes the discos are a birthday treat because you can hire the Community Centre. Brownies are held there and Bingo on Wednesdays. Playgroup is every morning. In the Church Hall are different recreations. Cubs at 7-00 to 8-30 on Wednesday, Scouts 6-30 to 8-30 on Friday, Venture scouts 8-30 to 10-30 on Fridays. Dancing classes are held on Wednesdays. Also there is Keep Fit. There is a church and a chapel. There is an annual Maypole, everyone in school taking part. There are cricket teams and football teams. 94% of the working population of Wadworth work outside the village, mainly in Doncaster.
